Things that should be cleared up. DLCs "The Battle of ForlĂÂŹ" and "Bonfire of the Vanities" comes with every PC version of Assassin's Creed 2. Also, you dont have to download any values or emulators to get this DLC to work.

1) Install the game (the version does NOT matter).
2) Apply the latest patch (optional but recommended).
3) Apply the Skidrow crack
4) Open "AC2 DLC Enable" rar and extract the files "2.save" and "2.save.metadata" to the save folder location (it should be a folder name "4" that should be somewhere in C:\Program Files (x86)\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher\storage)
5) If you already have a save game. DONT overwrite the 2.save file (it'll delete your saved game). Instead, change that file's name to 3 or 4 and then put in the save location.
6) The Three Templar Lairs should be marked on your map during some point in the game (wont be there in the beginning of a new game).
video tutorials of Assassin: http://www.gamestia.com/video/assassins-creed-2-c15s1.html

Ok so I also had problems doing this kinda sh!t but ill tell u some instructions IF you have skidrow

so backup ur files!! (you find them in programfiles/ubisoft/ubisoft game launcher/storage/skidrow/4)
1. Copy the files in the extracted folder, place them into were ur saves r 
2. Check if ur save is deleted(ingame) or not(then you can enter ur save file and enjoy all the dlc's!!!), if it is. delete newly added files and replace with original save files. 
3. (if your save file was deleted ingame) copy the 2.save.metadata into were ur saves r and rename the 2.save (from the dlc enable file) to 1.save and drag to were ur save files r and HAVE FUN!!!!(ull have to replace tho)
